paragraph1: The GEorGE brand was created on the basis of innovative technologies in the global cosmetics industry. We can confidently affirm that we are revolutionaries in the development of our own natural products with colloidal gold, colloidal silver and hydrolyzed hyaluronan, which in turn act at a deep cellular level and support skin regeneration.
paragraph2: Thanks to precise laboratory and dermatological researches with international certificates, our brand ranks in the global cosmetics market next to names such as La Prairie, Guerlain, La Mer, Lancome, La Roche, Vichy, Vinoderm, etc. GEorGE is the first cosmetic brand in Bulgaria that has no analogue in technological developments with colloidal gold and silver tinctures and a guaranteed final result.
paragraph3: Our team collaborates with specialists with international awards and recognition. Thanks to their high professionalism and qualification, we can guarantee immediate results when using our products. With their help, we created the AURUM series for anti-aging care, which acts regenerating at the cellular level with permanent sustainability and provides prevention against future aging of the skin. We are in the process of developing a series for problematic skin and other products that will reach the customers soon.
